title: White Cotton A-Line Midi Dress
image_prompt: Flat-lay product render of a white cotton A-line midi dress, short sleeves, crew neckline, subtle tonal stitching, minimalistic design, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible seams and hems, no model or mannequin.
techpack: White cotton A-line midi dress with short sleeves and crew neckline. Regular fit with invisible side zipper closure. Tonal stitching throughout, clean hem finish. Fabric: 100% cotton, pre-shrunk. Recommended GSM: 150-180.
design_text:
